page.title: 12RECREATION IN GLASSARY
page.content: THE NEAREST PLACE WHERE ORGANISED RECREATIONAL FACILITIES ARE TO BE FOUND IS IN LOCHGILPHEAD, ABOUT FOUR MILES FROM GLASSARY. THERE, MANY PEOPLE FROM THE VILLAGE USE THE{SPORTS {CENTRE}FOR ALL TYPES OF SPORTS. THOSE WHO ARE INTERESTED IN FOOTBALL, BOWLING AND GOLF MUST ALSO TRAVEL TO LOCHGILPHEAD, WHERE THERE ARE CLUBS WHICH CATER FOR THESE SPORTS. THE NEAREST{SWIMMING POOL}IS TO BE FOUND AT ARDRISHAIG. IT IS HOPED THAT A POOL WILL BE BUILT AT LOCHGILPHEAD IN THE NEAR FUTURE. FUNDS ARE NOW BEING RAISED FOR THIS VENTURE. PEOPLE OF THE VILLAGE HOLD REGULAR {WHIST DRIVES}AND MANY MEN GO FISHING AND SHOOTING FOR DEER AND GAME.
